MEV transaction analysis - a sandwich attack

26 Aug 2022 in Blog on Block chain

利用Eigenphi.io研究MEV交易时的分析case (photo taken in Perth, 2019)

  • Introduction
  • The front-running transaction
  • The victim transaction
  • The back-running transaction

Introduction

MEV (0x8cfbb935a8461e8681ac1e06b760530d824f6ef085a07e7ac49121eaee3cbe5a), is a sandwich-attach transaction discussed as an #AwesomeTx on github. It is also the first bundle packed in block 14811888 (before the Merge) by Flashbot. The net profit of this attack is 37.534 ETH.

The front-running transaction

  • After having monitored a USDC/USDT swap transaction, the attacker borrowed a 131,705 WETH flah loan (6,20), and collateralized the WETHs borrowed together with his own 2,423 WETH (0,5,8), to further borrow 145,000,000 DAI (11)

  • The DAIs borrowed were then swapped for 144,513,418 USDC in Curve Pool (12,13), lowering the USDC/DAI, as well as the USDC/USDT rate

  • The USDC swapped out in the last step was then swapped into 144,513,418 DAI to repay part of the 145,000,000 DAI debt. After withdrawing 131,705 WETH from collateral to replay the flash loan, 486,582 DAI debt is left with 2,423 WETH collateralized.

The victim transaction

  • The victim paid much more USDTs for USDCs in Curve Pool than in other LPs (8-11)

The back-running transaction

  • Basically the same as The front-running transaction the front-running transaction but acting in a reversed way. In the beginning, the attacker borrowed a 131,705 WETH flash loan (1,18) and took it as collateral to borrow 144,513,418 USDC (6)

  • The borrowed USDCs were then swapped into 145,078,476 DAI in Curve Pool

  • After repaying the 486,582 DAI debt (10) and the new USDC debt (11,13,15), the attacker got back 134,129 WETH from collateral, which consists of 131,705 WETH flash loan and the attacker’s own 2,423 WETH

  • The attacker then repaid the flash loan and earned 78,476 DAI (20) as a profit from sandwich attack

  • After paying the miner 1.973 ETH by Coinbase Transfer, the attacker’s net profit is 37.634 ETH

About

Hi, I am a data analyst with 3-year experience in China IT Industry.

Before the career transition, I was an astrophysicist, focusing on galaxy evolution based on large-sample statistical analysis.

I am also an amateur in Japanese translation. I like listening to music and swimming in my idle time. RESUME
